welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nawabshah, known as the "City of the Holy Prophet" and famous for its rich history and cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our city during your stay.

restaurants.name: Soup Point
restaurants.description: Soup Point is a soup spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: Food Club
restaurants.description: Food Club is a fast food restaurant located in Nawābshāh.

restaurants.name: Sukoon Restaurant
restaurants.description: Sukoon Restaurant is a diner located in Nawābshāh.

restaurants.name: Ajwa Garden & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Ajwa Garden & Restaurant is a restaurant located in Landhi.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nawabshah Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nawabshah Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.
